<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, minimum-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no"
    />
    <meta name="format-detection" content="telephone=no">
    <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style" content="white">
    <meta name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable" content="yes" />
    <title>${Option.title}</title>
    <script src="${httpPath}assets/brooder.core.js" type="text/javascript">
    </script>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="${httpPath}assets/packets/page/css/grid.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="${httpPath}assets/packets/page/css/default.css">
    <script>
      $().ready(function() {
        window.basePath = "${httpPath}";
        $("body").Boot({
          basePath: "${httpPath}assets/packets/"
        });
      });
    </script>
  </head>
  
  <body>
  </body>

</html>
title: base
